price: A Él pertenece lo que habita la noche y el día. Él todo lo oye, todo lo sabe.
arabic: ۞ وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā sakana fī al-layli wal-nahāri wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
